Sticky-HeaderContainer"><div class="Sticky-AdContainer" id="sticky-ad-header"><div id="ad-header" class="AD AD--intervention AD--padded Container" data-gpt-section-name="" data-gpt-section-id=""></div></div><div class="Sticky-Header"><header class="Header Header--no-left"><div class="Masthead"><h1 class="u-hide">The Times & The Sunday Times Homepage</h1><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"header:masthead:logo"}'  href="/" class="Masthead-logo js-tracking"><img class="Masthead-logo-image" src="/d/img/logos/sundaytimes-with-crest-black-53d6e31fb8.png" alt="sundaytimes Masthead" /></a><time datetime="2020-05-24">Sunday May 24 2020 <i class="Masthead-icon Masthead-icon--dot"></i> Midday Update</time></div></header></div></div><section class="BodyContainer Container  MainContainer  "><div data-edition-date="2020-05-24" data-publication="sundaytimes" id="main-container" role="main"><section class="Section Section--news js-orientationHook"data-total="1" data-section-name="news" id="section-news"data-section-identifier="0c90d36f-3439-47a8-8087-ceedac32312b" data-document-category="section"data-name="news" data-text="News" data-theme="news"><header class="Section-header is-hidden Theme--news"><div class="Section-headerBackground"><h2 class="Section-title Headline--section"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"section heading:news","section_details":"section:news"}'  href="#section-news" class="js-scrollTo js-tracking" data-link-target="section-news">News</a></h2></div></header><div class="SliceCollection"><div class="Puffs Puffs--2Large2Small" data-slice-template="grouped-puffs-2-and-2" data-length="1" data-total="1"><div class="Slider"><div class="PuffItem PuffItem--large" data-main-href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/18538668-95d8-11ea-8cd3-563103839a48" data-section-href="#section-sundayTimesMagazine" style="background-color:#f3981d;"><div class="PuffItem-content"><h3 class="PuffItem-headline Headline Headline--puff">The great escape</h3><p class="Strapline Strapline--puff PuffItem-strapline">Fresh start or false step? Harry and Meghan’s new life in LA</p></div><div class="PuffItem-media"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:article title","article_parent_name":"article:the great escape"}'  href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/18538668-95d8-11ea-8cd3-563103839a48" class="js-tracking"><div class="js-delayedImageLoad" data-src="//www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/methode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F738c5a83-f165-4906-9c29-4a26ea23f85b.png?crop=1300%2C1040%2C0%2C0&quality=7&resize={width}" data-alt=""></div><noscript><img src="//www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/methode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F738c5a83-f165-4906-9c29-4a26ea23f85b.png?crop=1300%2C1040%2C0%2C0&quality=7" alt=""></noscript></a></div><div class="PuffItem-footer"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:section","section_details":"section:magazine"}'  href="#section-sundayTimesMagazine" class="Link--primary PuffItem-cta js-tracking js-scrollTo" data-link-target="section-sundayTimesMagazine">MAGAZINE</a></div><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:article title","article_parent_name":"article:the great escape"}'  href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/18538668-95d8-11ea-8cd3-563103839a48" class="js-tracking PuffItem-overlayLink">The great escape</a></div><div class="PuffItem PuffItem--large" data-main-href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/f0f2c716-9b89-11ea-b91f-3ef5a66c08bc" data-section-href="#section-newsReview" style="background-color:#00a59a;"><div class="PuffItem-content"><h3 class="PuffItem-headline Headline Headline--puff">Self-isolation diary</h3><p class="Strapline Strapline--puff PuffItem-strapline">A punch-up, boys? It&#39;s just like the old days, writes Bridget Jones</p></div><div class="PuffItem-media"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:article title","article_parent_name":"article:self-isolation diary"}'  href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/f0f2c716-9b89-11ea-b91f-3ef5a66c08bc" class="js-tracking"><div class="js-delayedImageLoad" data-src="//www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/methode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F373efd53-060e-4bf7-a404-06a057e93b40.png?crop=656%2C524.8%2C0%2C0.1&quality=7&resize={width}" data-alt=""></div><noscript><img src="//www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/methode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F373efd53-060e-4bf7-a404-06a057e93b40.png?crop=656%2C524.8%2C0%2C0.1&quality=7" alt=""></noscript></a></div><div class="PuffItem-footer"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:section","section_details":"section:newsReview"}'  href="#section-newsReview" class="Link--primary PuffItem-cta js-tracking js-scrollTo" data-link-target="section-newsReview">NEWS REVIEW</a></div><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:puff:article title","article_parent_name":"article:self-isolation diary"}'  href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/f0f2c716-9b89-11ea-b91f-3ef5a66c08bc" class="js-tracking PuffItem-overlayLink">Self-isolation diary</a></div><div class="PuffItem PuffItem--small" data-main-href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/a512c322-99c8-11ea-9a66-d2c4ad4f40d4" data-section-href="#section-style" style="background-color:#ea5570;"><div class="PuffItem-content"><h3 class="PuffItem-headline Headline Headline--puff">Style Beauty Awards</h3><p class="Strapline Strapline--puff rush to wipe phones before Beijing’s iron fist falls</a></h3><p class="Dip Item-dip"><span class="u-showOnWide">Hong Kong democracy activists yesterday made frantic plans to cover their tracks amid fears of a brutal crackdown by the world’s most powerful surveillance state. Many deleted politically sensitive online postings, wiped social media accounts and turned to proxy servers that mask their identities after China announced sweeping national security laws for the territory.</span><span class="u-showOnMedium">Hong Kong democracy activists yesterday made frantic plans to cover their tracks amid fears of a...</span><span class="u-showOnSmall">Hong Kong democracy It’s just like the old days</a></h3><p class="Dip Item-dip"><span class="u-showOnWide"><b>Wednesday May 20th</b><br><i>11.30am</i> Totally Confused re: lockdown. It’s like Brexit: half the people I know are Remainers and still won’t leave the house; the others...</span><span class="u-showOnMedium"><b>Wednesday May 20th</b><br><i>11.30am</i> Totally Confused re: lockdown. data-length="2" data-total=""><div class="Item NL-1 Theme--sport"><div class="Item-content"><div class="ArticleLabel-container"><p class="ArticleLabel Item-articleLabel u-themeColor">David Walsh</p></div><h3 class="Item-headline Headline--xl"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:armstrong documentary gives cycling cheat the rope to hang himself","section_details":"section:sport"}'  href="/edition/sport/lance-armstrong-documentary-gives-cycling-cheat-the-rope-to-hang-himself-mlhxfx2x0" class="js-tracking">Armstrong documentary gives cycling cheat the rope to hang himself</a></h3><p class="Dip Item-dip"><span class="u-showOnWide">Imagine it’s July any time over the past four years. You’re a fan of the Tour de France and looking for analysis of the day’s stage. There’s a good chance that Lance Armstrong is the port into which you sail. Armstrong’s take on the world’s greatest bike race has become hugely popular. For the three weeks of the Tour his podcast sits towards the top of the Apple charts...</span><span class="u-showOnMedium">Imagine it’s July any time over the past four years. You’re a fan of the Tour de France and...</span><span class="u-showOnSmall">Imagine it’s July any time over the past four years. You’re a fan of the Tour de France and...</span></p><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:armstrong documentary gives cycling cheat the rope to hang himself","section_details":"section:sport"}'  href="/edition/sport/lance-armstrong-documentary-gives-cycling-cheat-the-rope-to-hang-himself-mlhxfx2x0" class="Item-cta Link--primary js-tracking">Read the full story</a></div><div class="Item-media"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:armstrong documentary gives cycling cheat the rope to hang himself","section_details":"section:sport"}'  href="/edition/sport/lance-armstrong-documentary-gives-cycling-cheat-the-rope-to-hang-himself-mlhxfx2x0" class="js-tracking"><div seemed to possess a talent from another planet"></noscript></div></a></div><div class="Item-content"><div class="ArticleLabel-container"><p class="ArticleLabel Item-articleLabel u-themeColor">Stephen Jones | Stuart Barnes</p></div><h3 class="Item-headline Headline--s"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:searing memories of edwards and england’s best — the greatest scrum halves ranked","section_details":"section:sport"}' chancellor Rishi Sunak last month to increase grants and loans to small businesses"></noscript></div></a></div><div class="Item-content"><h3 class="Item-headline Headline--s"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:confusion infects contest for start-ups","section_details":"section:business"}'  href="/edition/business/confusion-infects-contest-for-start-ups-j2mvmqnlh" class="js-tracking">Confusion infects contest for start-ups</a></h3><p class="Dip Item-dip"><span class="u-showOnWide">A week before the lockdown started in March, Matt Hodges-Long was asked for help by his local council in Surrey Heath.</span><span class="u-showOnMedium">A week before the lockdown started in March, Matt Hodges-Long was asked for help by his local council in Surrey Heath. Residents were forming groups on WhatsApp and Facebook, offering help to the vulnerable by bringing food and medical supplies. sudden midlife career change</a></h3></div></div><div class="Item T-1 Theme--theSundayTimesMagazine"><div class="Item-media"><a avoided losing a limb while planting veg with his girlfriend, Lisa Hogan"></noscript></div></a></div><div class="Item-content"><div class="ArticleLabel-container"><p class="ArticleLabel Item-articleLabel u-themeColor">JEREMY CLARKSON</p></div><h3 class="Item-headline Headline--s"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:the vegetable COMPETITION</p></div><h3 class="Item-headline Headline--m"><a data-tracking='{"event_navigation_name":"widget:article","article_parent_name":"article:win a luxury break in alnwick, with the class="Strapline Item-strapline">Agents are reporting a surge in pent‑up demand from families who want to holiday closer to home</p><p class="Dip Item-dip"><span class="u-showOnWide">Standing in her garden watching as helicopters flew overhead, Jo Ashby might have been forgiven for thinking it was a police raid on sunbathers breaking social-distancing rules on nearby Polzeath beach. class structure from the top tier</a></h3><p class="Dip Item-dip"><span class="u-showOnWide">When I was 17, I went to New York state to work as an au pair.
